tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE genetic_data (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  genetic_code TEXT,
  treatment_options JSON
)

CREATE TABLE PatientGeneticData (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  genetic_variant JSON,
  treatment_options JSON
)

CREATE TABLE TreatmentHistory (
  treatment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  treatment_date DATE,
  treatment_description VARCHAR(500)
)

CREATE TABLE GeneticTestResults (
  test_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  genetic_test_date DATE,
  test_results JSON
)

CREATE TABLE Patient_Treatments (
    patient_id INT,
    treatment_id INT,
    date_started DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (treatment_id) REFERENCES Treatments(treatment_id),
    PRIMARY KEY (patient_id, treatment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patient_treatments (
    treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    option_id INT,
    treatment_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient_data(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (option_id) REFERENCES treatment_options(option_id)
);

CREATE TABLE physician_notes (
    note_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    note TEXT,
    note_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient_data(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(20),
    diagnosis VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE GeneticData (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    genetic_sequence TEXT,
    mutation_type VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Treatments (
    treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    treatment_name VARCHAR(255),
    treatment_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);
